bonding.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a process in which a special relationship develops between two or more people
bonding.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: the bonding between mare and foal
bonding.translation[0].definitions[1].de: the connection of atoms or of two surfaces that are glued together
bonding.translation[1].definitions[0].de: the practice of keeping goods that have been imported in a special building and officially promising to pay the import tax when it is due
bonding.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: a $100 auction-licensing fee and $80 a month to cover bonding
